mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedulemaker VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(sd_mno) + 1, 1) FROM schedulemaker), #{SOVO.type}, #{SOVO.placeName}, #{SOVO.body}, #{SOVO.price}, #{SOVO.liCnt}, #{SOVO.dayCount}, #{SOVO.placeLat}, #{SOVO.placeLng}, #{SOVO.pid}, #{SOVO.placeAddress}, #{SNO}, #{SOVO.url} )

INSERT INTO schedule VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(s_no) + 1, 1) FROM schedule), #{scheduleName}, TO_DATE(#{sSdate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{sEdate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{sCountry}, #{sArea}, 1002, sysdate, null, #{scheduleBody}, 0, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT SD_MTYPE type, SD_MNAME placeName, SD_MBODY body, SD_MCOST price, SD_MORDER liCnt, SD_MDAY dayCount, SD_MLAT placeLat, SD_MLNG placeLng, SD_MPID pid, SD_MADDRESS placeAddress, SD_MURL url FROM SCHEDULEMAKER WHERE SD_SNO = #{sno} ORDER BY dayCount, liCnt
